rules_text:
Spirited [i](When this enters, you may activate one of its activated abilities without paying its cost.)[/i]
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life.
{2}, {T}, Pay 2 life: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token. It can't block this turn.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice a permanent: Draw a card.
